Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.Player.Effect

Class BasicEffect

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Player.Effect.BasicEffect
All Implemented Interfaces:
Effect, java.lang.Cloneable
public class BasicEffect
extends java.lang.Object
implements Effect
this is the basic effect class, with the standard method, this class will be decorated according to the chosen Card
